p: We see this hesitancy to return to “normalcy” among both policymakers and society at large. Policymakers are not simply talking about “building back better” but are implementing interventions to support a green recovery and tying organizational bailouts to sustainability targets. Society at large has experienced some positive changes as a result of lockdown and might not want to return to its old ways. Seizing the opportunity and making interventions to “lock in” change should be pursued.
